description:
In 2037 a remote little town in the
South American Andes was cut off from
the outside world by a mudslide after
heavy rains that had lasted a whole
week. And then the calamity occurred:
there was a massive explosion at the
military bio-chemical facility on the
outskirts of the town during a power
outage caused by the bad weather...
Our heroine is Chilia, an expert
weapons master. Her mission is to
defend the areas of the town where
innocent people who have not yet
been infected are living. The armed
forces have been notified, but for
reasons that remain unexplained, it
will take them 7 days to arrive.
name:
The Lost Town
The Dust
